statements: SELECT * FROM Philanthropic_Foundations;
SELECT foundation_name, funding_amount FROM Philanthropic_Foundations;
SELECT * FROM Philanthropic_Foundations ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT foundation_name, social_initiative FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE foundation_id = 1;
SELECT foundation_name, funding_amount, social_initiative FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE funding_amount >= 100000 ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE funding_amount > 10000 ORDER BY foundation_name ASC, foundation_id DESC;
SELECT foundation_name, funding_amount, social_initiative FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE social_initiative = 'Education' ORDER BY funding_amount DESC;
SELECT foundation_id, foundation_name, impact_evaluation FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE impact_evaluation LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY foundation_id;
SELECT * FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE funding_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY foundation_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_foundations, AVG(funding_amount) AS avg_funding FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE social_initiative = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM Grants WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT recipient, amount FROM Grants WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Foundations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, focus_area FROM Foundations WHERE founding_date < '2010-01-01';
SELECT foundation_id, SUM(amount) FROM Grants GROUP BY foundation_id;
SELECT id, recipient, amount FROM Grants WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT foundation_id, COUNT(*) FROM Grants GROUP BY foundation_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC
SELECT recipient, SUM(amount) AS total_grant_amount FROM Grants WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY recipient HAVING SUM(amount) > 50000
SELECT f.name AS foundation_name, f.location, g.amount FROM Foundations f JOIN Grants g ON f.id = g.foundation_id WHERE g.amount > 5000 ORDER BY f.name ASC, g.amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Foundations f LEFT JOIN Grants g ON f.id = g.foundation_id WHERE g.id IS NULL ORDER BY f.name
SELECT * FROM Foundation;
SELECT foundation_name, funds_allocated FROM Foundation;
SELECT initiative_name, funding_amount FROM SocialInitiative WHERE funding_amount > 10000;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM SocialInitiative ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, initiative_id, evaluation_date, impact_rating FROM ImpactEvaluation WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT foundation_name, location, funds_allocated FROM Foundation WHERE funds_allocated > 100000 ORDER BY funds_allocated DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date, funding_amount FROM SocialInitiative WHERE funding_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT foundation_name, location, funds_allocated FROM Foundation WHERE location LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY foundation_name;
SELECT foundation_name, location, funds_allocated, start_date FROM Foundation JOIN SocialInitiative ON Foundation.foundation_id = SocialInitiative.foundation_id ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date, impact_rating FROM SocialInitiative JOIN ImpactEvaluation ON SocialInitiative.initiative_id = ImpactEvaluation.initiative_id ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Foundations;
SELECT id, name FROM Foundations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, mission_statement FROM Foundations WHERE name LIKE '%health%';
SELECT * FROM Initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM Grants GROUP BY id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Foundations;
SELECT name, mission_statement FROM Foundations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT foundation_id, SUM(amount) AS total_grants FROM Grants GROUP BY foundation_id;
SELECT Initiatives.name, ImpactMetrics.metric_name, ImpactMetrics.value FROM Initiatives INNER JOIN ImpactMetrics ON Initiatives.id = ImpactMetrics.initiative_id;
SELECT name AS Initiative_Name, description AS Initiative_Description, start_date, end_date FROM Initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date FROM Grants WHERE recipient_id = 1;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date, recipient_id, project_id FROM Grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Recipients WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Projects WHERE budget < 10000;
SELECT donor_name, city, country FROM Donors WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, grant_date FROM Grants;
SELECT * FROM Recipients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, city, country FROM Donors WHERE country = 'USA' AND city LIKE 'San%';

SELECT grant_amount, grant_date, project_name, recipient_name FROM Grants JOIN Recipients ON Grants.recipient_id = Recipients.recipient_id JOIN Projects ON Grants.project_id = Projects.project_id ORDER BY grant_date ASC;
